title: The Doctor's Choice ~ Badlands
description: The murder of her only relative forces Camryn Carmichael, a lonely young doctor to choose between her dream career in a Houston research hospital and a rural practice close to rancher, Breckenridge T. Ryan the man of her dreams. (The T stands for Trouble) When her suspicions about her great-auntâ€™s death prove to be true, she decides to stay and uncover the villain herself.
author: J.D. Faver
